summary: A spoiled schoolgirl runs away from home, gets pregnant while hitch-hiking, and ends up as a fashion model for a pair of beauticians who like to photograph women committing crimes.
cast: Divine|David Lochary|Mary Vivian Pearce|Mink Stole|Edith Massey|Cookie Mueller|Susan Walsh|Michael Potter|Ed Peranio|Paul Swift|George Figgs|Susan Lowe|George Hulse|Margie Skidmore|Berenica Cipcus|Betty Woods|Roland Hertz|Ramsey McClean|Henry Bederski|Hilary Taylor|Cindy Chosky|Laurel Douglas|Mark Lazarus|Anne Figgs|Sally Albaugh|Lynn Russo|Bob Willis|Valerie Stafford|Bob Adams|Channing Wilroy|Al Strapelli|Seymour Avigdor|Christine Mason|Mumme|Pat Moran|Marina Melin|Elizabeth Coffey|George Stover|Cowboy Foulke|Mimi Lochary|Vincent Peranio
keywords: absurd violence|absurd humor|male frontal nudity|cult film|black comedy
title: Cosa de hembras
